Class SimpleSemaphore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nzdis.micro.util.SimpleSemaphore

  • public class SimpleSemaphore
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleSemaphore() 
      SimpleSemaphore(java.lang.Class instantiatedClass)
      Instantiates Semaphore object withclass name as semaphore name; wait output is activated.
      SimpleSemaphore(java.lang.Class instantiatedClass, boolean printWaitOutput)
      Instantiates Semaphore object with class name as semaphore name and allows specifying if wait output is produced.
      SimpleSemaphore(java.lang.Object objectInstantiating)
      Instantiates Semaphore object with object's class name as semaphore name; wait output is activated.
      SimpleSemaphore(java.lang.Object objectInstantiating, boolean printWaitOutput)
      Instantiates Semaphore object with object's class name as semaphore name and allows specifying if wait output is produced.
      SimpleSemaphore(java.lang.String name)
      Instantiates Semaphore object with object's class name as semaphore name; wait output is activated.
      SimpleSemaphore(java.lang.String name, boolean printWaitOutput)
      Instantiates Semaphore object with a given String as semaphore name and allows specifying if wait output is produced.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acquire()
      Acquires semaphore or waits if semaphore is already acquired by another thread.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the semaphore.
      boolean isFree()
      Checks if a semaphore can be acquired.
      void printWaitInformationOutput(boolean print)
      Allows to de/activate printing of semaphore wait output.
      void release()
      Releases a previously acquired semaphore.
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the semaphore's name.
      java.lang.String toString()
